sect1.title: Support
sect1.para: There's a couple of different places you can turn to if this documentation comes short of answers to your questions or if you want to give us feedback:

para.emphasis: If you have a general question about usage of the application

listitem.para: Ask on the applications bboard at arsdigita.com.

para.emphasis: If you want to report a bug or keep up-to-date on bug fixes
If you are interested in the general status of the Bboard application

listitem.para: Up to date info on BBoard is available from the BBoard status page.

para.emphasis: If you have questions, comments or suggestions to this documentation

listitem.para: Visit the Documentation Central or fire directly at acs-docs@ardigita.com.
